New Records: Chicago White Sox broke the club record for losses set by the 1970 team with 107 losses
Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a home run in the 4th inning to give the Mets a 1-0 lead
Starling Marte drove an RBI double in the 9th inning to extend the Mets' lead to 2-0
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sean Manaea pitched two-hit ball over seven innings for the Mets
Garrett Crochet struck out the first seven batters for the White Sox
Others: The White Sox completed the first 0-10 homestand in franchise history
The Mets pulled within a game of Atlanta for the final NL wild card
